LanguageData.Constellation_Sagittarius.label: Constellation of Sagittarius
LanguageData.Constellation_Sagittarius.description: The constellation of Sagittarius shone in the sky. This event instills courage in your shooters. Every creature feels a surge of strength.
LanguageData.Constellation_Hercules.label: Constellation of Hercules
LanguageData.Constellation_Hercules.description: The constellation of Hercules shone in the sky. This event instills courage and independence in the hearts of your warriors. Every creature feels a surge of strength.
LanguageData.Constellation_Build.label: Constellation of Nagonik
LanguageData.Constellation_Build.description: The constellation of Nagon shone in the sky. This event instills the spirit of professionalism in your builders. Every creature feels a surge of strength.
LanguageData.Constellation_Art.label: Painter Constellation
LanguageData.Constellation_Art.description: In the sky the constellation of the Painter shone. This event inspires the spirit of creativity in your masters. Every creature feels a surge of strength.
LanguageData.Constellation_Animals.label: Constellation of Big Dog
LanguageData.Constellation_Animals.description: In the sky the constellation of the Big Dog has shone. This event instills the spirit of confidence in your stockbreeder's. Every creature feels a surge of strength.
LanguageData.Constellation_Plant.label: Constellation of Bootes
LanguageData.Constellation_Plant.description: In the sky, the constellation Bootes shone. This event instills the spirit of peace in your farmers. Every creature feels a surge of strength.
LanguageData.Constellation_Social.label: Constellation of Dolphin
LanguageData.Constellation_Social.description: The constellation of the Dolphin shone in the sky. This event inspires your merchants. Every creature feels a surge of strength.
LanguageData.Constellation_Craft.label: Constellation of Forge Hephaestus
LanguageData.Constellation_Craft.description: The constellation Forge Hephaestus shone in the sky. This event ignites the excitement in the eyes of your artisans. Every creature feels a surge of strength.
LanguageData.Constellation_Mining.label: Constellation of Table Mountain
LanguageData.Constellation_Mining.description: Constellation Table Mountain shone in the sky. this event illuminate way your miners. Every creature feels a surge of strength.
LanguageData.Constellation_Cooking.label: Constellation of Bowl
LanguageData.Constellation_Cooking.description: In the sky, the constellation Bowl shone. This event opens the culinary secrets to your cooks. Every creature feels a surge of strength.
LanguageData.Constellation_Medicine.label: Constellation of Ophiuchus
LanguageData.Constellation_Medicine.description: The constellation Ophiuchus shone in the sky. This event reveals the secrets of surgery to your doctors. Every creature feels a surge of strength.
LanguageData.Constellation_Intellectual.label: Constellation Eagle
LanguageData.Constellation_Intellectual.description: In the sky, the constellation of the Eagle shone. This event inspires a thirst for knowledge to your scientists. Every creature feels a surge of strength.
LanguageData.Constellation_Shield.label: Constellation of Shield
LanguageData.Constellation_Shield.description: The constellation Shield appeared in the sky. This event hides your gaze from the truth. Every creature feels a breakdown.
LanguageData.Constellation_Lynx.label: Constellation of Lynx
LanguageData.Constellation_Lynx.description: Lynx constellation appeared in the sky. Targets elude you. Every creature feels a breakdown.
LanguageData.Constellation_Triangle.label: Constellation of Triangle
LanguageData.Constellation_Triangle.description: The constellation of the Triangle appeared in the sky. You can not understand your own construction drawings. Every creature feels a breakdown.
LanguageData.Constellation_Clock.label: Constellation of Clock
LanguageData.Constellation_Clock.description: You notice the lack of time for creativity. Every creature feels a breakdown.
LanguageData.Constellation_Hydra.label: Constellation of Hydra
LanguageData.Constellation_Hydra.description: You see your helplessness before the animals. Every creature feels a breakdown.
LanguageData.Constellation_Corvus.label: Constellation of Corvus
LanguageData.Constellation_Corvus.description: You notice how your crop is destroyed by birds. Every creature feels a breakdown.
LanguageData.Constellation_Indian.label: Constellation of Indian
LanguageData.Constellation_Indian.description: You are be aloof. Every creature feels a breakdown.
LanguageData.Constellation_Eridan.label: Constellation of Eridan
LanguageData.Constellation_Eridan.description: Thoughts are confused, hands do not obey you. Every creature feels a breakdown.
LanguageData.Constellation_Taurus.label: Constellation of Taurus
LanguageData.Constellation_Taurus.description: Rocks does not give in to you. You are lost in the mountain tunnels. Every creature feels a breakdown.
LanguageData.Constellation_Coma.label: Constellation of Virgo
LanguageData.Constellation_Coma.description: It seems you have stopped remembering your own recipes. Every creature feels a breakdown.
LanguageData.Constellation_Snake.label: Constellation of Snake
LanguageData.Constellation_Snake.description: Your surgery skills leave you. Every creature feels a breakdown.
LanguageData.Constellation_Octans.label: Constellation of Octans
LanguageData.Constellation_Octans.description: The Octant illuminates you with its dim light. You can not find the strength to research. Every creature feels a breakdown.
